alert.note: Alert for Cedar; Dade (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 21 at 4:14PM CDT until April 21 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Cedar County in southwestern Missouri... North central Dade County in southwestern Missouri... * Until 500 PM CDT. * At 413 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles northeast of Sheldon, or 10 miles southwest of El Dorado Springs, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Stockton Lake... El Dorado Springs... Stockton... Jerico Springs... Arcola... Umber View Heights... Olympia... Caplinger Mills... Filley... Wagoner... Cedarville... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
